message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 40, you can't do better than that!
You said 40 was the best I could do, I'll try to do better than that!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're not giving me enough, I'll try to squeeze you out!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a little more, but not much
I'm not giving up yet, I'll take what I can get!
You're running out of options, I'll give you a small bone
This is my last chance, I'm not giving up!
You're really desperate now, I'll give you a tiny crumb
This is my last stand, I'm not giving up yet!
You're out of options, I'll give you a small piece of the pie
